text: Save the children is a good organization. Do you like to donate to charities?
Yes, I do. What does Save the Children do?

he Save the Children Fund, commonly known as Save the Children, is an international non-governmental organisation that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
Can you give me their website, so I can look into them?
Sure, here is the link.  URL
Thank you! Why are you talking about this charity instead of the others?
Sure, here is the link  URL
Why are you talking about this charity instead of the others?

I think it is a charity that is well deserving and underfunded. Children in underdeveloped countries do not have the support that other kids have and I just want to give them a chance to improve their lives.
In what ways do they help children?
They provide things such as food and medical treatment. Things that are basic needs are given to them.
I\'m glad they do that but there are many charities that "claim" to do the same thing.

Yes, you are correct. However, this organization has been effective in helping others and all donations are matched. I believe their goal is to really help the children. They are known to help in disasters too.
Well, ok. I'll keep them in mind and do some research into them.
Do you think you would like to donate in future?
If I can vouch for them, yes.
That is great. I hope you consider them and decide they are worthy
I'm glad there are people like you out there who are attempting to make a difference in the world.

Thank you. If you had a chance to donate some of your money earned today, how much would you donate to the charity now? Your donation would be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from O dollars to all your payment.
I would consider donating $0.50.
Wow. That is wonderful. You are a really generous and caring person.
